content: CS-TTS SA Smoke and acoustic Track Seal Fast and clean preformed solution for top-of-wall drywall joints, eliminating the need for messy caulk ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Ready to use joints and cavity barriers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast installation – fewer working steps (one and done) Sealing properties designed for real jobsite conditions – forms a more reliable sound and smoke barrier even on imperfect concrete No mess, zero waste – no caulking or tools required Makes inspection easier Versatile solution for any drywall track size Applications Smoke and sound seal for head-of-wall joints between top track and gypsum to flat concrete slabs CS-TTS SA 358 & 600 are designed for a perfect friction fit with common track sizes – 3 5/8 and 6 CS-TTS SA OS is designed for a flexible solution for various track applications For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 24 g/l Length: 120.5 in Application: Joints Technical Data | Length | 120.5 in | Application | Joints | Movement | Yes | Storage and transportation temperature range | 14 - 122 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2217299 - SMOKE & ACOUSTIC TRACK SEAL CS-TTS SA OS - Package Size 20 pc - 2217298 - SMOKE & ACOUSTIC TRACK SEAL CS-TTS SA 600 - Package Size 20 pc
